mapper.sql: order_id, order_number, order_creat_time, order_creator, order_creator_trade, order_confirmation_time, order_status, logistics_unit_id, logistics_num, logistics_name, contact_phone, principal_order_id, credit_get_id, credit_use_id, credit_grantor_id, order_amount, amount_payable, amount_actually_paid, payment_account_id, payment_time, invoice, freight_unit, freight_number_id, goods, applicationletter, receiving_address_id, invoice_num, letter_status

if.test: whereMap != null && whereMap.orderStatus != null and whereMap.orderStatus != ''
whereMap != null && whereMap.userId != null and whereMap.userId != ''
whereMap != null && whereMap.orderConfirmationTime != null and whereMap.orderConfirmationTime != ''
whereMap != null && whereMap.creditGrantorId != null and whereMap.creditGrantorId != ''
whereMap != null && whereMap.principalOrderId != null and whereMap.principalOrderId != ''

mapper.select: SELECT o.order_number as orderNumber, c.contract_number as contractNumber, s.credit_number as creditNumber, s.credit_amount as applyAmount, o.order_amount as applyAmountr, o.applicationletter as orderAmount FROM gyl_order o INNER JOIN gyl_contract c ON o.principal_order_id = c.contract_id INNER JOIN gyl_credit s ON o.credit_get_id = s.id WHERE o.letter_status = 0
select t.r_address_address from gyl_receiving_address t where t.r_address_default=0 and t.unionID=#{unionID}
select t.r_address_area from gyl_receiving_address t where t.r_address_default=0 and t.unionID=#{unionID}
select t.r_address_person from gyl_receiving_address t where t.r_address_default=0 and t.unionID=#{unionID}
select t.r_address_phone from gyl_receiving_address t where t.r_address_default=0 and t.unionID=#{unionID}
select t.r_address_id from gyl_receiving_address t where t.r_address_default=0 and t.unionID=#{unionID}
mapper.insert:
insert into gyl_order
order_id,
order_number,
order_creat_time,
order_creator,

invoice,

freight_number_id,
goods,
applicationletter,
receiving_address_id,
invoice_num,
letter_status,

mapper.update:
update gyl_order
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_creat_time = #{orderCreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_creator = #{orderCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_creator_trade = #{orderCreatorTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_confirmation_time = #{orderConfirmationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_unit_id = #{logisticsUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_num = #{logisticsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_name = #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_order_id = #{principalOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_get_id = #{creditGetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_use_id = #{creditUseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_grantor_id = #{creditGrantorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount_payable = #{amountPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount_actually_paid = #{amountActuallyPaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_account_id = #{paymentAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_unit = #{freightUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_number_id = #{freightNumberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applicationletter = #{applicationletter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiving_address_id = #{receivingAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_num = #{invoiceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
letter_status = #{letterStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gyl_order
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_creat_time = #{orderCreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_creator = #{orderCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_creator_trade = #{orderCreatorTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_confirmation_time = #{orderConfirmationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_unit_id = #{logisticsUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_num = #{logisticsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_name = #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_order_id = #{principalOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_get_id = #{creditGetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_use_id = #{creditUseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
credit_grantor_id = #{creditGrantorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount_payable = #{amountPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
amount_actually_paid = #{amountActuallyPaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_account_id = #{paymentAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_unit = #{freightUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_number_id = #{freightNumberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applicationletter = #{applicationletter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiving_address_id = #{receivingAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_num = #{invoiceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
letter_status = #{letterStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
